dict.string: • The top label on the Miniplayer Widget displays the song name, and the bottom one displays the artist.
• Touch and drag to move it anywhere on the screen.
• You can easily dismiss the Miniplayer Widget by pressing the "x" button, or dismiss by using activator action.

• Double tap anywhere on the Miniplayer Widget to push it over to the right side of the screen, so just a small part is showing, allowing you to continue using your iOS Device without it obstructing your view.
• Double tap on it again to bring it back to the center of the screen.
• Tap once on the album art to open the "now playing" application.
• Long "hold" anywhere on the Miniplayer Widget to "center" it to the middle of the screen.
